description: Detects creation or execution of UserInitMprLogonScript persistence method
name: Logon Scripts (UserInitMprLogonScript)
query: ((process.parent.executable:*\\userinit.exe AND (NOT ((process.executable:(*explorer.exe OR *\\proquota.exe)) OR (process.command_line:(*netlogon*.bat* OR *UsrLogon.cmd* OR *C\:\\WINDOWS\\Explorer.EXE*)) OR (process.executable:*\\Citrix\\System32\\icast.exe)))) OR process.command_line:*UserInitMprLogonScript*)
author: Tom Ueltschi (@c_APT_ure)
Tim Shelton
